answers.answer: Im 38 Weeks And 0 Days They Want To Induce Me Next Week Do To a Ultrasound I Had Today That Showed A Grade 3 Placenta...
Im being induced due to gestational diabetes. The doc doesnt want the baby getting to big.
Thank you ladies for the feedback. :)
I was induced monday n had her yesterday at 7:36am <3 mine was due to high bp
I'm going to be induced on Monday because my doc said I had that choice. I'll be 39 weeks tomorrow :)

Usually it is due to a reason but I do there are a few ppl on this app who have chosen to get induced at 39 weeks. I'll be getting induced Sunday because I'm passed my due date. Currently 40 weeks 5 days so I'll be 41 by my induction date
With my first son I was induced at 39 week's because I was already 4cm dilated and had moved quickly in a week and I lived an hour an a half away from the hospital
My Dr said once I hit 39 weeks I can be induced.Which is today.  I'm going To wait it out but he said he will not let me go past 41 weeks
I'm getting induced no later than 39 weeks BC my bp is high. It might happen earlier tho.
If there's no medical reason they won't usually induce you till 10 days after your due date x
I don't have any complications at all but my doctor gave me the choice to be induced at 39 weeks which is Monday. I'm going for it!

question: So my question is when do you get induce at 39 weeks?  What would be the main  reasons...If you are not having any problems do doctors wait till after 40 or 41 weeks? Please comment mommas. ;-)Ftm, thank you guys.
title: Reasons
